summary: Patches the Historical Roman weapons and shields for Dual Sheath Redux use.
descriptionHtml:
[b]- Description -[/b]

Makes the necessary changes to the Roman (Imperial) meshes for use with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155]Dual Sheath Redux[/url]. Does NOT include Celts or Parthians or the additional shields.
[b]
- Requirements -[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32988/?]Historical Revival - The Roman Era
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155]Dual Sheath Redux[/url]

[b]- Installation -[/b]

Unpack the contents of the .zip file to your Skyrim\Data directory. Overwrite if prompted.

[b]- Uninstallation -[/b]

Delete the following files from your Skyrim\Data directory.
1) meshes\armor\imperial\jcetratusOnBack.nif
2) meshes\armor\imperial\jcetratusredOnBack.nif
3) meshes\armor\imperial\jparmaOnBack.nif
4) meshes\armor\imperial\jscutumOnBack.nif
5) meshes\armor\imperial\jscutumstraightDuraEuroposOnBack.nif
6) meshes\armor\imperial\jscutumstraightOnBack.nif
7) meshes\weapons\imperial\ImperialSwordLeft.nif
8) meshes\weapons\imperial\ImperialSwordSheath.nif
9) meshes\weapons\imperial\jgladiusLeft.nif
10) meshes\weapons\imperial\jgladiusSheath.nif
11) meshes\weapons\imperial\jspathaIILeft.nif
12) meshes\weapons\imperial\jspathaIISheath.nif
13) meshes\weapons\imperial\jspathaLeft.nif
14) meshes\weapons\imperial\jspathaSheath.nif

[b]- Changelog -[/b]

1.0 - Initial release.

[b]- Credits -[/b]

Thanks toÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/714867]Jedo_Dre[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1267569]Neovalen[/url] for their great mods!

[b]- Permissions -
[/b]
Any changes done to this file requires permission from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/714867]Jedo_Dre[/url] in accordance to permissions listed under [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32988/?]Historical Revival - The Roman Era[/url].
author: DigitalVixen
